Detailed Description

The FontManager is able to switch the fonts displayed on the screen and return glyphs of these fonts. Furthermore it provides functionality for retrieving information about the different fonts of a font pack.

Member Function Documentation

BOOLEAN FontManager::CanDisplay (  WCHAR  chr,
INT  index = m_active_font_index
)  [static]
 

Returns TRUE if the character of parameter chr is available in the font identified by the parameter index.

Parameters:
chr Character of that shall be displayed.
index Index of the font of which the character shall be displayed. Default index is the index of the active font.
Returns:
TRUE if the character with of the given font (index) can be displayed otherwise FALSE.

Returns the FontEntry object at position index.

Parameters:

Returns:

BOOLEAN FontManager::GetGlyph (  WCHAR  chr,
Glyph &  glyph,
TextAttr  text_attr = TextFormat::Normal,
INT  font_index = m_active_font_index
)  [static]
 

Returns a pointer to a glyph structure for the character chr. The style of the glyph can be identified by the parameter text_attr.

Parameters:
chr Character value of which the glyph data shall be returned.
glyph Glyph instance to fill with data.
text_attr Style the character should be of. Default value is TextFormat::Normal.
font_index Index of the font the character shall be read from. Default value is the index of the active font.
Returns:
TRUE if the glyph contains the data of the character handed over in parameter chr.

BOOLEAN FontManager::GetGlyphs (  const WCHAR *  chr,
Glyph *  glyphs,
INT  count,
TextAttr  text_attr = TextFormat::Normal,
INT  font_index = m_active_font_index
)  [static]
 

Writes the glyphs for a given string (chr) into the array provided by the caller.

Parameters:
chr Character array containing the values the given glyphs array shall contain.
glyphs Glyph array containing glyph objects to be filled with data.
count Number of glyphs.
text_attr Style the character should be of. Default value is TextFormat::Normal.
font_index Index of the font from which the glyphs shall be read.
Returns:
TRUE if the glyph array contains the data of the characters handed over in parameter chr.

index Index of the font of which the height shall be returned. Default index is the index of the active font.

INT FontManager::GetNumGlyphs (  INT  index = m_active_font_index  )  [static]

Parameters:
index Index of the font. Default value is the index of the active font.
Returns:
Number of glyphs available in the active font.

BOOLEAN FontManager::SetActiveFont (  INT  index  )  [static]
 

Sets the font at position index as active font. Getting information about the font by calling the getter methods of the FontManager uses this font if no parameter for the font index is provided.

Parameters:
index Index of the font that shall be set as active font.
Returns:
TRUE if the font identified by the parameter index is set as active font, otherwise FALSE.

void FontManager::SetUseStaticFonts (  BOOLEAN  value  )  [static]
 

BOOLEAN FontManager::SupportsStyle (  WCHAR  chr,
TextAttr  text_attr,
INT  index = m_active_font_index
)  [static]
 

Validates if the font at position index supports the given style.

Parameters:
chr Character that shall support the style.
text_attr Style the character should be of. Default value is TextFormat::Normal.
Returns:
TRUE if the character chr of the active font supports the TextAttribute text_attr, FALSE otherwise.

BOOLEAN FontManager::SupportsUnicodeRange (  WCHAR  from,
WCHAR  to,
INT  index = m_active_font_index
)  [static]
 

Returns TRUE if the font specified by parameter index provides the characters within the range specified by the parameters from and to.

Parameters:
from Character to start reading from.
to Character where to stop reading.
index Index of the font.
Returns:
TRUE if every character within the given range is available, FALSE otherwise.
